title: Lakshmi Kiran: Coral and Emerald Statement Stud Earrings
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (Vajraalu). Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: These striking earrings showcase a floral-inspired design. The central Emerald is surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds, further embellished by symmetrical Coral beads. Intricate filigree work and open-work detailing in gold add a touch of modern delicacy to the design, while maintaining a distinctly Indian aesthetic.
occasions: and special occasions (Vishesha Dinamu). Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to formal events.
description: These earrings blend traditional South Indian gemstone combinations with contemporary design sensibilities. The use of high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship ensures a piece that is both beautiful and enduring. The natural Coral and Emerald are believed to bring good fortune and prosperity to the wearer.
